description: Properties of a personnel class shall be presented as personnel class properties. Each personnel class shall have zero or more recognized properties
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The nested personnel class property(s) makes up part of this personnel class property as the whole.

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information and description about the personnel class property.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value

contents.name: propertyType
contents.description: Defines the type of the property.

enumValues.name: classType
enumValues.description: The property value is defined for the class and there is no value associated with an instance

enumValues.name: instanceType
enumValues.description: the property value of the class is undefined

enumValues.name: defaultType
enumValues.description: The property value is defined for the class as the default instance value, but individual instances of the class may redefine specific values.
